scripts.dev: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping dev in ACT environment' ) || (doppler run -- vite)
scripts.build: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping build in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && vite build ) || (doppler run -- vite build)
scripts.build:staging: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping build:staging in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && vite build --mode staging ) || (doppler run -- vite build --mode staging)
scripts.build:production: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping build:production in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && vite build --mode production ) || (doppler run -- vite build --mode production)
scripts.lint: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint src && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx" ) || (doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint src && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx")
scripts.lint:fix: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:fix in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint src --fix && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix" ) || (doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint src --fix && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix")
scripts.lint:ci: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:ci in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint src --max-warnings=0 && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0" ) || (doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint src --max-warnings=0 && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0")
scripts.lint:oxlint: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:oxlint in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec oxlint src ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec oxlint src)
scripts.lint:fix:oxlint: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:fix:oxlint in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec oxlint src --fix ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec oxlint src --fix)
scripts.lint:ci:oxlint: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:ci:oxlint in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec oxlint src --max-warnings=0 ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec oxlint src --max-warnings=0)
scripts.lint:eslint: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:eslint in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx)
scripts.lint:fix:eslint: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:fix:eslint in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix)
scripts.lint:ci:eslint: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping lint:ci:eslint in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0 ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0)
scripts.preview: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping preview in ACT environment' ) || (doppler run -- vite preview)
scripts.test: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping test in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec vitest run ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest run)
scripts.test:ui: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping test:ui in ACT environment' ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest --ui)
scripts.test:run: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping test:run in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec vitest run ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest run)
scripts.test:coverage: ( [ "$ACT_LOCAL" = "true" ] && echo 'Skipping test:coverage in ACT environment' ) || ( [ "$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION" = "true" ] && pnpm exec vitest run --coverage ) || (doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest run --coverage)
